rdf:Description.dc:description: Catalogue of an exhibition at the Provincial Museum of Alberta, Edmonton, marking the bicentennial of Fort Chipewyan and illustrating the culture and history of the Indian and Metis residents and the fur trade.
University of Alberta copy in the Bryan-Gruhn Collection.
